name: Medieval Battlegrounds
description:
Medieval Battlegrounds is a roguelike first-person action game set in a medieval world. The game features 2 private game modes for you and your STEAM friends to play: Team Deathmatch and Castle Defense. In Team Deathmatch, battle in teams of up to 6 players with 60 max players. Fight with sword and shield, bow and arrow, magic books and cannons! Fight friends and enemies alike, as teams are formed in-game. Pick the same team or a different team than your friends, and battle away to see who truly is the last man standing! In Castle Defense mode, play a solo match or in teams. All players fight together to defend the castle and town from waves of AI enemies. Stop the legions from destroying the crystal conductors that channel magic for the town.

Explore the castle, loot randomly generated weapons, and see if you have what it takes to claim victory for you and your team!

*All game modes are "private", hosted locally by you or a friend. Friends can then join and invite other friends to the game, up to 60 players! There is no public matchmaking system at this time.

For support and bugs, please post on the Community Page.

Here are a few upcoming features:

Useable cannons on the castle.
The map showing friendly players and markers.
A "Quit With Team" button for the host while in-game.
